articles.title: Inflation check: Gas, cars, truck prices rising - Fox Business
articles.description: The Consumer Price Index rose 5.4% in July, matching the prior month's gain as the fastest since August 2008, while prices at the producer level jumped 7.8%, the most on record, according to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics.
articles.content:
